title: Jimmy Butler says he loves having Derrick Rose as a teammate
text:
Jimmy Butler is tired of answering questions about his relationship with Derrick Rose.
The alleged feud between the two stars has produced multiple headlines during the past few weeks, including the latest – that Butler isn’t happy with Rose’s work ethic.
According to a source, Jimmy Butler hasn't been thrilled with Derrick Rose's 'work ethic' Derrick Rose says feud with Jimmy Butler wouldn't exist if they weren't 'two blacks' But Butler attempted the squash the rumors Thursday morning, telling reporters “let us be.”
Butler: "I don’t understand why everybody wants to find a problem with me and Derrick. Let us be the fierce, (expletive) competitors we are"
— K.C. Johnson (@KCJHoop) October 8, 2015
“I’ll try to keep my cuss words to a minimum, but it’s making me mad,” Butler said, via the Chicago Tribune . “I love having Derrick as a teammate. I think we can be one of the best — if not the best — backcourts in the NBA.”
Butler had a breakout season last year as he averaged 20 points per game. The Bulls were 28-17 in games in which both players were active.
